item.description:
See a great movie, The Girl with the Pearl Earring, and learn about the Enneagram personality types, a great way to learn, meet people, have dinner and come away with new ideas. Herb starts and stops the movie to explain what's happening personality type wise. Ok if you are new or advanced Enneagram student.

Herb Pearce is an Enneagram expert, teacher, coach, therapist and author. He's been leading Enneagram workshops for 23 years and movie nights for over 2 years.

781 648 3737, herb@herbpearce.com, www.herbpearce.com

$25 includes movie, $5 off if you don't eat. Please let me know in advance if you are planning to eat. Vegetarian food. Sliding scale to $20.

7:15 dinner

8:00 movie

Girl with a Pearl Earring

2003PG-1399 minutes

In this cinematic adaptation of Tracy Chevalier's best-selling historical fiction novel, Scarlett Johansson stars as Griet, the young housemaid with a hidden appreciation for art who becomes the muse of Dutch master painter Johannes Vermeer (Colin Firth). Vermeer is famous for capturing the luminosity and grace of women in domestic settings. But his proud wife (Essie Davis) would be furious if she knew the pretty Griet was his latest subject.

Cast:
Scarlett Johansson, Colin Firth, Tom Wilkinson, Judy Parfitt,Cillian Murphy, Essie Davis, Joanna Scanlan, Alakina Mann,David Morrissey, Anna Popplewell
Director:
Peter Webber
Genres:
Drama, Romantic Dramas, Dramas Based on Contemporary Literature, Dramas Based on the Book, Pre-20th Century Period Pieces, Period Pieces
This movie is:
Romantic, Understated
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Dinner & Personality Types in the Movies - Girl with the Pearl Earring
